turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: HI there, what can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like to order three medium pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what would you like on them?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'm looking for something with a lot of meat. Do they have any meat type meat lovers type of pizza?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes, they have a pizza called "heart attack" that has all softs of meat on it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, wow. Yeah, okay, three pizzas of the same kind, please. Make sure it has extra cheese as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure! Extra cheese added.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. All right, perfect. Can you place the order for me, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yes, one moment please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to opt for thin or thick crust for the pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Give a thick crust, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: certainly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 Medium thick crust heart attack Pizzas with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: let me get you the total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total for those will be $52.11.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Place the order, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: certainly, Just one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, all done. Your order has been sent to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The order should be ready for pickup in 25 min.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're very welcome.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.
